author: Hazel K
title: Brilliant location and luxury facilities
text: I stayed here with my husband on 25 February and the hotel was perfect! The staff were so friendly and our room was immaculate. The bed was extremely comfortable with lovely pillows. The bathroom was lovely with a great shower and luxury toiletries. There was a large mirror that was ideal for applying makeup and plenty of lighting. The Blind Spot downstairs was brilliant with delicious cocktails in a speakeasy style bar. We didn't have breakfast at the hotel as it was quite expensive but the restaurant looked lovely from the outside. I'd definitely return to this hotel.
